traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The steeder can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Extraordinary Leap
entries: The distance of the steeder's long jumps is tripled; every foot of its walking speed that it spends on the jump allows it to jump 3 feet.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) poison damage.

actions.name: Sticky Leg
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Small or Tiny creature. The target is stuck to the steeder's leg and is {@condition grappled} until it escapes (escape DC 12). The steeder can have only one creature {@condition grappled} at a time.
